mutants.code:
def triplet_loss(margin, positive_distance, negative_distance):
    return max(1, margin + positive_distance - negative_distance)

def triplet_loss(margin, positive_distance, negative_distance):
    return max(-1, margin + positive_distance - negative_distance)

def triplet_loss(margin, positive_distance, negative_distance):
    return max(1, margin + positive_distance - negative_distance)

def triplet_loss(margin, positive_distance, negative_distance):
    return max(0, margin + positive_distance + negative_distance)

def triplet_loss(margin, positive_distance, negative_distance):
    return max(0, (margin + positive_distance) * negative_distance)

def triplet_loss(margin, positive_distance, negative_distance):
    return max(0, margin - positive_distance - negative_distance)

def triplet_loss(margin, positive_distance, negative_distance):
    return max(0, margin * positive_distance - negative_distance)
